name: Haven
description: You touch a surface and create a doorway that opens into an interdimensional space. The space is a 3x3 unit empty room that lasts for 8 hours. Anything objects remaining inside when the duration ends is lost forever while creatures are pushed out to the entrance.
charge: The space becomes 5x5 units and retains everything placed inside it so when it is resummoned again, it is in the same state it was left in.
